text: At the Close of a Century is a box set album that has Stevie Wonder's greatest hits from 1962-1995 and was released on November 21, 1999. == Track listing == === Disc 1 === # Fingertips (Pts. 1 & 2) - (6:55) # Uptight (Everything's Alright) - (2:53) # Nothing's Too Good For My Baby -(2:38) # Blowin' in the Wind - (3:43) # A Place in the Sun - (2:45) # Hey Love - (2:45) # I Was Made to Love Her - (2:37) # Until You Come Back to Me (That's What I'm Gonna Do) - (3:01) # I'm Wondering - (2:55) # Shoo-Be-Doo-Be-Doo-Da-Day - (2:46) # You Met Your Match - (2:38) # For Once in My Life - (2:50) # I Don't Know Why - (2:45) # My Cherie Amour - (2:50) # Yester-Me, Yester-You, Yesterday - (3:04) # Never Had a Dream Come True - (3:13) # Signed, Sealed, Delivered I'm Yours - (2:40) # Heaven Help Us All - (3:15) # We Can Work It Out - (3:17) # If You Really Love Me - (2:56) # Never Dreamed You'd Leave in Summer - (2:56) # Superwoman (Where Were You When I Needed You) - (8:07) # I Love Every Little Thing About You - (3:55) === Disc 2 === # Superstition - (4:26) # You Are The Sunshine Of My Life - (2:55) # You And I -
